Description:
Overview:As a Duty News Editor at Al Aan TV, you will play a vital role in overseeing the newsroom's operations, ensuring the delivery of timely, accurate, and engaging news content. You'll be at the forefront of news curation, working closely with a team of journalists and producers to provide our audience with reliable and impactful news coverage.Key Responsibilities:Editorial Oversight: Lead the newsroom during assigned shifts, making critical editorial decisions, and maintaining the highest standards of accuracy and integrity.
Content Coordination: Collaborate with reporters, correspondents, and other team members to prioritize, edit, and publish news stories, features, and multimedia content.
Breaking News Management: Quickly respond to developing stories, coordinating coverage, and updating content as events unfold.
Quality Assurance: Review articles, headlines, and visuals to ensure they align with editorial guidelines, style standards, and fact-checking protocols.
Deadline Management: Ensure all content is published promptly, meeting established deadlines and adhering to the newsroom's production schedule.
Audience Engagement: Monitor audience feedback, analytics, and trends to adjust content strategies and enhance reader engagement.
Cross-Departmental Collaboration: Work closely with graphics, multimedia, and social media teams to enhance the impact and reach of news content.
Editorial Planning: Participate in editorial meetings to contribute ideas, angles, and coverage strategies for upcoming stories and events.
Staff Support: Provide guidance and support to junior editors and reporters, fostering a collaborative and learning-focused environment.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Journalism, Communications, or related field.
Proven experience as a news editor or journalist, showcasing strong editorial judgment and decision-making skills.
Arabic speaker.
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced news environment, managing priorities and adapting to breaking news situations.
Proficiency in digital publishing tools, video editing and content management systems.
Exceptional leadership and communication skills.
A deep understanding of current events, news trends, and the evolving media landscape.
Flexibility to work varied shifts, including evenings and weekends.
Join us in shaping the news landscape and delivering impactful stories to our audience. Apply now to be part of our dedicated newsroom team!
